page.title: 16Education
page.content: We can begin in our area by attending a{playschool}from the age of 2.There are no formal lessons here,just learning to get on with one another. From the ages of 4 or 5 the children here attend the{Dartford Infants {School.}In the 1st year we learn to {read}and{write}and also{paint,}do {maths,}and{P.E.}It gets harder each year.When you're in the 3rd year you can do some{cooking}and make{clay {pots. At the age of 7 children move onto the{Westwood Junior School.}It has a {swimming pool}and a big{field.}There are 4 years in this Junior school with 3 parallel classes in each year.We work in{groups}for some of our{topic, {English}and{art work.}In{maths}we progress at our own pace. We have {tournaments}against other schools for {rounders, stoolball,}and{netball.
